message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we split the difference and settle on $112.50?
I appreciate the compromise, but I was really hoping to get closer to my original target of $110. Could you meet me at $111?
